paragraphText:
Since 2022 we've been dedicated to caring for lawns around central Arkansas. Starting as a pet waste removal business, Fresh Greens Landscaping has become your one-stop shop for any and all lawn care or landscaping needs.

It can be a cutthroat business, so we work overtime to earn your loyalty. We put our customers first every time, because we know that without you we wouldn't have any lawns to cut!

What sets us apart is our dedication to quality service, open communication, reliability, and our customer-first approach; and while many lawn care companies say the same, we guarantee it! If after any service you are unsatisfied, let us know and we'll come back out to fix it as soon as possible.
